info.title: Redback Issues Database Connection handler
info.description: Connects to Redback's issue tracker database and executes all the red sql queries.

prop.name: settings
prop.description: The database server settings manager object.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Initializes the redback's issues database connector.

method.name: execute
method.description: Executes a red sql query (dbQuery) to the redback issues database.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A number of attributes to be passed as arguments to the query. It is an associative array to respond to the sql parameters.

method.returndescription: For successful SELECT, SHOW, DESCRIBE or EXPLAIN queries mysqli_query() will return a mysqli_result object. For other successful queries mysqli_query() will return TRUE. Returns FALSE on failure.
